info.description: Swagger/OpenAPI documentation for the backend service.
info.title: Backend API

get.description: return a page of the most recent published articles
get one published article by UUID

post.description: set a new password using reset token
exchange refresh token for new access token

put.description: create or update an article bookmark for authenticated user

post.description: return whether a bookmark exists for the given article

get.description: list comments optionally filtered by object and paginated

post.description: create a comment on an object (article, etc.) as the current user

put.description: update existing article fields, current user must be author

post.description: create a new article in dashboard as current user

put.description: modify a comment owned by current user

post.description: post a comment as authenticated user

get.description: paginated list of comments authored by current user

put.description: admin action to edit a user's comment

get.description: fetch comment by UUID and user

delete.description: remove a comment belonging to specified user

post.description: add a new element via dashboard
upload a file via multipart form

get.description: paginated list of files owned by current user
paginated list of bookmarks for authenticated user

delete.description: delete a bookmark owned by current user
remove a file owned by authenticated user

put.description: update profile data for current user
update password for current authenticated user

post.description: add a new role via dashboard
register a new user via dashboard

get.description: return a page of the most recent published articles with the given hashtag
returns the contents used for home page
return a page of runner nodes
retrieve information about a runner node
return tasks scheduled for this worker

post.description: accept a task result or status update from worker
instruct worker to halt a task
